content: k knit following the single asterisk k2tog knit 2 together as directed m1 make 1 stitch by picking ** when prompted follow the up loop between last and instructions as directed next stitch and work into up to the double asterisk the back of this loop or within the two sets of double asterisks p purl *** when prompted follow the rem remaining instructions as directed colourlab repeat repeat up to the triple asterisk or within the two sets of triple rs right side 100% british wool asterisks st s stitch es dk work instructions within st-st stocking stitch 1 row knit brackets as many time 1 row purl ppaarrtt oonnee as directed tbl through back of loop cn cable needle decrease together decrease decrease ing ws wrong side increase increase ing special abbreviations cr2r slip next st onto cn and hold at back of work k1 then p1 from cn cr2l slip next st onto cn and hold at front of work p1 then k1 from cn c4b slip next 2 sts onto cn and hold at back of work k2 then k2 from cn c4f slip next 2 sts onto cn and hold at front of work k2 then k2 from cn ppaarrtt ttwwoo colourlab 100% british wool dk ppaarrtt tthhrreeee ppaarrtt ffoouurr ppaarrtt oonnee mmaarrvveelllloouuss mmuusshhrroooommss lleevveell part one marvellous mushrooms chart 1 using 4mm needles and b cast on 192 sts knit 4 row row 1 rs k to end row 2 ws p to end row 3 p1 *k1 p2 repeat from * to last 2 sts k1 p1 row 4 k1 *p1 k2 repeat from * to last 2 sts p1 k1 these 4 row set waffle stitch and are repeated repeat last 4 row 8 times more knit 4 row place chart 1 work row 1 46 in st-st as set on chart 1 and at same time work 24 st repeat 8 times part one complete leave 192 sts on your needle ppaarrtt ttwwoo ppuummppkkiinn ppiicckkiinngg lleevveell part two pumpkin picking chart 2 using d knit 3 row increase row ws k8 k2 m1 k2 44 times k8 236 sts row 1 rs k to end row 2 ws p to end row 3 k2 *c4b c4f repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 row 4 p to end row 5 6 as row 1 2 row 7 k2 *c4f c4b repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 row 8 p to end these 8 row set honeycomb cable and are repeated repeat last 8 row 3 times more decrease row rs k8 k1 k2tog k2 44 times k8 192 sts knit 3 row place chart 2 work row 1 42 in st-st as set on chart 2 and at same time work 24 st repeat 8 times part two complete leave 192 sts on your needle ppaarrtt tthhrreeee cchhaannggiinngg lleeaavveess lleevveell part three changing leaves chart 3 using e knit 3 row increase row ws k12 m1 15 times
